segments.text: I was anxious to find out what the sellers had to say about my counter-offer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was able to contact them so , if you ’ ll step into my office , we ’ ll talk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did they go with the proposed counter-offer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They want you to pick up the cost of the home inspection , but they accepted your offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is a home inspection very expensive ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It can cost between five hundred and one thousand dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do I get to choose who inspects the home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you get to choose . I would spend a little more to get a really thorough inspection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you call the owners with my acceptance right away ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to contact the sellers immediately . They were looking forward to your acceptance .
segments.speaker: S2
